Content: This could be a great app if it didn't crash and the tools worked. It's a real faff!

app takes great photos, but it works is non-intuitive and have bugs. Sometimes applied filter make change to photo, it shows in previews in the gallery oka, but then you open photo again, it opens without filter. I don't understand how to use albums and gallery functional. Why i can't open image in full size and why images open by long press not double tap. Why photos not load into phone gallery by default and I must export it (two same files in memory) Some freezes even on top smartphone

a bit of uncharted territory,inline help wise. app crashes sometimes, but that's not unexpected after a rewrite. took me 5 minutes to find myself familiar with the controls after that it was pure joy to photograph everything. nice textures and filter. recommended purchases: all filter, all textures. both for ~10€ at time of writing. best this side of Adobe lightroom.

I honestly feel that you are planning to shut this app down. There have been no new updates for a very long time. I love using this app but lately it crashes everytime I open it. And pictures aren't getting saved either. They get saved as blank grey images. If you are shutting down this app then please do it already. And if that is not plan then please do something about the frequent crashes.

Xperia XZ here, working with this app is a bit difficult. The loading ( or transitioning ) is a bit slow in this app with those real-time effects viewing. Hopefully it will get better and much more smoother later on. As for now, every transitioning that you made feel like it is about to crash! Just choosing the settings/effects to get ready for a photo shooting is not easy ( as it isn't snappy/smooth).
